original_text: And they come to you as people come, and they sit before you as my people, and they hear what you say but they will not do it; for with lustful talk in their mouths they act; their heart is set on their gain.
korean_text: 백성이 모이는 것 같이 네게 나아오며 내 백성처럼 네 앞에 앉아서 네 말을 들으나 그대로 행하지 아니하니 이는 그 입으로는 사랑을 나타내어도 마음으로는 이익을 따름이라

sentences.original_text: And they come to you as people come
and they sit before you as my people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내 백성처럼 네 앞에 앉고

sentences.original_text: and they hear what you say
but they will not do it
for with lustful talk in their mouths they act
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 입으로 정욕의 말을 하며 행함이라

sentences.original_text: their heart is set on their gain
